ygData.messageBody:
ian johnstone wrote:

> can anyone recommend a better robe for a level 14 mage, havnt got any
> money so buying of another player isnt really an option (besides i think


i don't know which robes i used at those levels. but i really believe
i was given a "Flowing Black Robe" by a higher player and my dream was
an "Oracle Robe". at those times FBRs were 300pp and Oracles about 1kpp.

today FBRs are 50pp to 150pp ... and Oracles are sold for 150pp to
300pp. i don't know what they are really worth, but i never paid more
when i needed one for my babies (eg alts).

i checked allakhazam for other ones, because i also think about getting
me a new one, but it isn't easy at all.

at your level you should go for a robe with AC, and MANA bonus. also
a HP modifier wouldn't hurt. when reaching 30 to 35 i would go for
a robe with INT, AC. at my current level (and INT over 200) i look
for a robe with INT and AC but it also should have resistance and MANA
stats. actually the more stats it has, the better ... ;-)

if you have access to allakhazam and can search for equipment, be sure
to turn off NO DROP, and GM ONLY items for your level ... it is almost
impossible that you will get them. (and it always hurts knowing what
items exist in game ;-)


> buying stuff off other players defies the point of the game)

imho economy is an important part of the game and there is nothing
"bad" about it. you never have to buy or sell anything if you don't
want to.

also think about tradeskills. to reach a level, where you can do
items other really want/need, those folks want to get paid. and if
you ever tried to raise tradeskills like jewelcraft, smithing, or
fletching to a level in the range of 150 to 200, you will know,
why you don't only have to pay the components they needed for the
one item they should make for you. have a look at "www.eqtrader.com"
at some tailoring or smithing components needed for velious stuff.

my favorite example is "ice burrower silk armor" (velious silk
tailoring):
http://www.eqtraders.com/secrets/recipes_velious_silks.htm
the silk patches you need is dropped by "Ice Burrower"s:
http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/search.shtml?id=5420



Biltilie Dwimmerlaik
level 52 mage
Tarew Marr
